comment: Tunnel + mapped from ERA ontology by Smart Data Models adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ERA/master/Tunnel/schema.json
description: A railway tunnel is an excavation or a construction around the track provided to allow the railway to pass for example higher land, buildings or water.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: complianceInfTsi
contents.comment: Compliance of the tunnel with INF TSI

contents.name: crossSectionArea
contents.comment: Cross section area

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: demonstrationSRT
contents.comment: EI declaration of demonstration for tunnel (SRT)

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dieselThermalAllowed
contents.comment: Diesel or other thermal traction allowed

contents.name: endLocation
contents.comment: End of tunnel

contents.name: hasEmergencyPlan
contents.comment: Existence of emergency plan

contents.name: hasEvacuationAndRescuePoints
contents.comment: Existence of evacuation and rescue points

contents.name: hasWalkway
contents.comment: Existence of walkways

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: nationalRollingStockFireCategory
contents.comment: National fire category of rolling stock required

contents.name: rollingStockFireCategory
contents.comment: Fire category of rolling stock required

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: specialTunnelArea
contents.comment: Special tunnel area

contents.name: startLocation
contents.comment: Start of tunnel

contents.name: tunnelDocRef
contents.comment: Reference to a document available from the IM with precise description of the tunnel

contents.name: tunnelIdentification
contents.comment: Tunnel identification

contents.name: tunnelKilometerEnd
contents.comment: Tunnel kilometer end

contents.name: tunnelKilometerStart
contents.comment: Tunnel kilometer start

contents.name: verificationSRT
contents.comment: EC declaration of verification for tunnel (SRT)

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
